job.title: Software Developer
job.description: stronguPosition SummarybrbrustrongThe ProgrammerAnalyst will be responsible for web application development in VBNet or C and experience writing queries in a relational database This position will assist a small team of developers in coding and modifying custom business applications and reportsbrbrstronguPosition Responsibilities May Include But Not Limited TobrustrongulliDesign develop and implement business applications using current technologiesliliDevelop design documents such as technical specifications functional requirements object modules system test plans technical and user documentationliliEnsure successful completion of projects liliProvide support to maintain existing Intranet Extranet and Internet sites and applicationsliliDocument process flowsliliParticipate in team code reviewsliliDevelop small to medium scale applications with low complexityliliOther projects or duties as assignedbrliulstronguQualificationsbrustrongulli Associates degree in Information Systems Management Information System Computer Science with at least 6 months of work experience or course work in software developmentlili Exposure to JavaScript and HTMLlili Exposure to development language such as NET or Javalili Exposure to database designlili Exposure to multitier development process flows use cases UMLlili Strong debugging skillslili Understanding of Object Orientated Principleslili Exposure to SDLC Software Development Life Cycle principleslili Ability to set and meet deadlines on projectslili The ability to communicate effectively through written and verbal communication including strong presentation skills and the ability to communicate technical speak to a nontechnical audiencelili Desire to pursue career in Application Developmentlili Ability to selfteach new IT technologieslili This position must pass a postoffer background and drug testliul
